errors.passwordMatch: Password and Confirm Password do not match
errors.passwordRule: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one digit, one special character, and be at least 8 characters long,

landingPage.title: Welcome to Stadspassen!
landingPage.description: Whether you use your grants or not, you could benefit from our supplier offers.

getStartedPage.title: Get started
getStartedPage.titleDescription: Choose an option below to get started

registerPage.createAccountDescription: It takes a few minutes to create an account
registerPage.createPasswordDescription: You will use your password and e-mail to login.
registerPage.uniqueEmailError: This email address has already been used for registration. Please use a different one.
registerPage.passnumberAlreadyUsedOrInvalid: This pass ID has already been used for registration or is invalid. Please use a different one.

registrationDialog.description:
We have sent a confirmation e-mail to **{{email}}**.
Please follow instructions in the message to confirm your account.
registrationDialog.title: Check your e-mail!

registerPage.resendEmailError: You have already confirmed your email.

loginPage.title: Log in
loginPage.wrongCredentials: Your e-mail or password is incorrect.
loginPage.requestError: There is an error in logging you into this application. Please try again later.
loginPage.accountNotConfirmed: Your account is not validated yet. Please check your email and confirm your email address to complete the registration process.
loginPage.captchaError: Your attempt was unsuccessful multiple times. Please complete the ReCAPTCHA to proceed.

offerDetailsPage.title: Offer details
offerDetailsPage.successMessage: You have successfully used this offer.
offerDetailsPage.inactive: This offer isn’t available yet. Check back on {{startDate}}!

termsAndConditions.question: Already have an account?

offerRestriction.alreadyUsedToday: You've already utilized this offer today.
offerRestriction.alreadyUsedYear: You've already utilized this offer this year.
offerRestriction.alreadyUsedMonth: You've already utilized this offer this month.
offerRestriction.alreadyUsedWeek: You've already utilized this offer this week.
offerRestriction.timeSlotsWarning: This offer is only valid between {{startHour}} and {{endHour}}.

logoutModal.title: Are you sure?
logoutModal.description: You will have to log in again later.

store.bankHolidaysWarning: Hours or services may differ due to the bank holiday. Please contact the business directly.

deleteAccount.sorryMessage: We're really sorry to see you go!
deleteAccount.descritpion: This process will permanently delete your Stadspassen account details. We can't retrieve this data once it's deleted, but you can create a new account any time.
deleteAccount.selectReasons: Select the reason(s) why you are deleting your account:
deleteAccount.successfullyDeletedMessage: Your account and data have been succesfully deleted!

reasons.noLongerUsing: I am no longer using the app

offer.useCode: You’ll need this code to use it in store.

discounts.noDiscountsDescription: It looks like you have no discounts yet. Explore offers to get your discounts!
